question_1: Our journey starts with the question
question_2: How should an investment be experienced that is natively “Vietnamese”?
platform_desc: Intuitive interface with real-time prices, alongside with simplified charting tools and order processings that encourages frictionless investment experience for investors from the very first trade.
ui: Minimal user interface with 2 underlying assets
ecosystem: ATS Token fuels the Nami Exchange ecosystem
ecosystem_desc: ATS will be used throughout the ecosystem to pay for all fees incurred on the Nami Exchange, with fee reduction policies published each year by Nami Exchange.
journey_desc: Nami Exchange is built on the brainpower and efforts of young Vietnamese enthusiasts, all aspired to contribute to the future of blockchain technology and digital assets within Vietnam.
